h1.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background-image: initial; background-position: 0px 0px; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; border: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; font-size: 34px; line-height: 60px; text-transform: capitalize; font-family: AmericanGotURW-Bol; text-align: center;

span.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px;

h5.style: color: rgb(50, 61, 73); background-image: initial; background-position: 0px 0px; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; border: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; letter-spacing: 5px; text-transform: uppercase; font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.57143em; font-family: Lato, sans-serif;

em.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px;

h5.em: “OUR MISSION IS TO BRING REVENUE BACK TO HOSPITALS FOR THEIR SURPLUS, UNUSED SURGICAL PRODUCTS WHILE OFFERING THEM DISCOUNTS ON HIGH-VOLUME PRODUCTS THEY ARE CURRENTLY UTILIZING.”

span.style: background: 0px 0px rgb(232, 19, 30); border: 1px solid rgb(232, 19, 30); margin: 5px 20px 0px 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; position: relative; display: inline-block; float: left; height: 48px; width: 48px; line-height: 48px; font-size: 42px; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); text-align: center; font-family: AmericanGotURW-Bol; border-radius: 4px;
color: rgb(50, 61, 73); font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; font-size: 15px;

p.span: At SPS, our focus is simple: helping our customers become higher quality healthcare providers without compromise. We cater our solution to serve the entire spectrum of healthcare facilities from large health systems to small surgical centers. At each level, our services are personalized to fit our customers’ needs.

span.style: background: 0px 0px rgb(232, 19, 30); border: 1px solid rgb(232, 19, 30); margin: 5px 20px 0px 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; position: relative; display: inline-block; float: left; height: 48px; width: 48px; line-height: 48px; font-size: 42px; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); text-align: center; font-family: AmericanGotURW-Bol; border-radius: 4px;
color: rgb(50, 61, 73); font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; font-size: 15px;

p.span: SPS is a leading provider of cost-saving solutions for hospitals and surgery centers across the United States who choose to save money without having to sacrifice quality of care. Our business model allows our customers to save money without interrupting surgeon preferences or hospital contracts. We accomplish this by providing hospitals, not one, but two cost-savings solutions for their high-volume surgical disposables.

span.style: background: 0px 0px rgb(232, 19, 30); border: 1px solid rgb(232, 19, 30); margin: 5px 20px 0px 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; position: relative; display: inline-block; float: left; height: 48px; width: 48px; line-height: 48px; font-size: 42px; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); text-align: center; font-family: AmericanGotURW-Bol; border-radius: 4px;
color: rgb(50, 61, 73); font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; font-size: 15px;

p.span: At a time when cost-saving initiatives are becoming more important as a national focus on improving the efficiencies of our healthcare system takes center stage, our services are at the cornerstone of responsible hospital behavior. Our two-solution model provides the means for both financial and environmental benefit with no loss of quality or care.

span.style: background: 0px 0px rgb(232, 19, 30); border: 1px solid rgb(232, 19, 30); margin: 5px 20px 0px 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; position: relative; display: inline-block; float: left; height: 48px; width: 48px; line-height: 48px; font-size: 42px; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); text-align: center; font-family: AmericanGotURW-Bol; border-radius: 4px;
color: rgb(50, 61, 73); font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; font-size: 15px;

p.span: SPS prides itself on the significant cost-savings we are able to achieve for our clients in addition to the role we play in helping them live up to their patient and physician responsibilities as leaders in their local medical community. Simply put, our service keeps valuable medical devices from expiring on the shelf and turning into waste; allowing hospitals to redirect resources towards increasing their quality of care. We are proud to say that we successfully eliminated hundreds of thousands of dollars from our customer’s costs by buying and selling the surgical surplus they would have otherwise thrown away.
